content: It’s okay to keep the door closed for as long as you need to steel your resolve. It’s okay if you don’t have any resolve right now. They don’t win by willing you to quit. They win by convincing you that you don’t deserve tenderness. Be tender with yourself. Take care of yourself. Take a break. Take time. Take privacy. Take what you need. Don’t take abuse as a standard for the industry, as something to accept. The standard should not be martyrdom. You deserve protection.
